#summary List of uses cases.

= Use Cases =

----
==User==

  * UC_U1: Log in. 

  * UC_U2: Log out.

----
==Scientist==

  * UC_S1: Run Simulation.
  
  * UC_S2: Upload Simulation parameters.

  * UC_S3: Download results of a Simulation.

  * UC_S4: Stop Simulation.

  * UC_S5: Check status/log of Simulation.

----
==Admin==
  
  * UC_A1: Add new module to Workflow.
  
  * UC_A2: Remove module from Workflow.

  * UC_A3: Provide input/output metadata (XSD) of a Module.

  * UC_A4: Provide XML file with execution parameters and commands.

  * UC_A5: Provides XML file with recovery configuration

  * UC_A6: Stop/abort running Workflow. 

  * UC_A7: Create new User.

  * UC_A8: Inactivate User.
